text.div:
FDA NDC

The National Drug Codes (NDC) codes are issued by the FDA for tracking drugs.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include all codes defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/ndc

name: FDANDC
title: FDA NDC
description: The National Drug Codes (NDC) codes are issued by the FDA for tracking drugs.
